attributes.action: Make government do EXACTLY what they say before they're elected into power
attributes.additional_details: The government parties say they're going to do this and that but after they've been elected they don't do what they said they were going to do. Please sign this petition if you want politicians to do EXACTLY what they say they're gonna do before they're voted into power. It should be illegal for politicians to say they're going to make this change and that change and then not make those changes after they've been voted into power. We're british people, if it wasn't for us voting, they wouldn't even be in power, the UK is OURS, not theirs. We the people have the human right to make politicians stick to their word.
